ghostPost.plaintext:
Ghost integrates with your social media accounts in several ways.

Connect your social accounts to your site
Enter your Facebook and Twitter account details “General” settings of Ghost
Admin to enable site-wide links to your social profiles defined by your theme.

Create custom sharing cards
In each post you can create custom sharing cards for Facebook and Twitter in the
post settings menu. This enables fine-grained control of how your content
appears when shared by others.

Structured data integration
Ghost includes full structured data and rich card support for Facebook, Twitter,
Instagram and many more — see the full list of integrations.
ghostPost.html:
Ghost integrates with your social media accounts in several ways.

Connect your social accounts to your site
Enter your Facebook and Twitter account details “General” settings of Ghost Admin to enable site-wide links to your social profiles defined by your theme.

Create custom sharing cards
In each post you can create custom sharing cards for Facebook and Twitter in the post settings menu. This enables fine-grained control of how your content appears when shared by others.

Structured data integration
Ghost includes full structured data and rich card support for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and many more — see the full list of integrations.
